question_text: Which is the most accurate way to estimate 70% of 24?
question_type: Multiple Choice Question with Single Answer
solution: The most accurate way to estimate 70% of 24 is $\\frac{7}{10} \\times 20$. Here is why:
Replace 70% with a fraction. $70\\% \\rightarrow \\frac{7}{10}$
Replace 24 with a number that is compatible with 10. $24 \\rightarrow 20$
The most accurate way to estimate 70% of 24 is to multiply $\\frac{7}{10} \\times 20$.
Compare your estimate to the exact answer:
Estimate: 70% of 24 ≈ $\\frac{7}{10} \\times 20$ = 14.0

question_type: Multiple Choice Question with Single Answer
solution: The most accurate way to estimate 90% of 12 is $\\frac{9}{10} \\times 10$. Here is why:
Replace 90% with a fraction. $90\\% \\rightarrow \\frac{9}{10}$
Replace 12 with a number that is compatible with 10. $12 \\rightarrow 10$
The most accurate way to estimate 90% of 12 is to multiply $\\frac{9}{10} \\times 10$.
Compare your estimate to the exact answer:
Estimate: 90% of 12 ≈ $\\frac{9}{10} \\times 10$ = 9.0
Exact answer: 90% of 12 = 0.9 × 12 = 10.8

question_text: Which is the most accurate way to estimate 20% of 84?
question_type: Multiple Choice Question with Single Answer
solution: The most accurate way to estimate 20% of 84 is $\\frac{1}{5} \\times 85$. Here is why:
Replace 20% with a fraction. $20\\% \\rightarrow \\frac{1}{5}$
Replace 84 with a number that is compatible with 5. $84 \\rightarrow 85$
The most accurate way to estimate 20% of 84 is to multiply $\\frac{1}{5} \\times 85$.
Compare your estimate to the exact answer:
Estimate: 20% of 84 ≈ $\\frac{1}{5} \\times 85$ = 17.0
Exact answer: 20% of 84 = 0.2 × 84 = 16.8

question_text: Which is the most accurate way to estimate 90% of 97?
question_type: Multiple Choice Question with Single Answer
solution: The most accurate way to estimate 90% of 97 is $\\frac{9}{10} \\times 100$. Here is why:
Replace 90% with a fraction. $90\\% \\rightarrow \\frac{9}{10}$
Replace 97 with a number that is compatible with 10. $97 \\rightarrow 100$
The most accurate way to estimate 90% of 97 is to multiply $\\frac{9}{10} \\times 100$.
Compare your estimate to the exact answer:
Estimate: 90% of 97 ≈ $\\frac{9}{10} \\times 100$ = 90.0
Exact answer: 90% of 97 = 0.9 × 97 = 87.3
